global_attributes.comment: Deployment summary: This glider was deployed to the Frontal Zone 2 (FZ-2) line 2019-04-08T00:14:00 UTC and recovered 2019-04-08T10:56:00 UTC. This glider was recovered shortly after deployment due to pump calibration issues.

platform.long_name: OOI Coastal Pioneer 1000m Slocum Glider cp_336
